StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetShippingPeriods]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: @FiscalYear int AS SELECT SP.ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.SHORT_NAME, LEFT(MC.SHORT_DESCRIPTION, 3) AS MONTH, SP.FISCAL_YEAR, CONVERT(varchar, SP.BEGIN_DATE, 106) as BEGIN_DATE, CONVERT(varchar, SP.END_DATE, 106) as END_DATE FROM SHIPPING_PERIOD SP WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON SP.ORGANIZATION_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MONTH_CODE MC ON SP.MONTH_CODE = MC.MONTH_CODE WHERE SP.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear ORDER BY RO.SHORT_NAME, MC.DISPLAY_ORDER
